mapper.select: select idx, plid, audio_idx, plname from playlist where plid=#{param1}
select plname from playlist where plid=#{param1} group by plname
mapper.insert: insert into playlist(idx, plid, audio_idx, plname) values(seq_playlist.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
mapper.select: select idx, plid, l.audio_idx, plname, audiotitle, artistname, audiofilename, imagename, id, regidate, play_count, like_count, party from playlist l inner join audioBoard a on l.audio_idx=a.audio_idx where plid=#{param1}
select plname from (select tb.*, rownum rnum from (select distinct plname from playlist where plid=#{param1})tb) where rnum between #{param2} and #{param3}
mapper.delete: delete from playlist where plid=#{param1} and idx=#{param2} and audio_idx=#{param3}
